Investigate and understand the state and national educational and licensing
requirements for careers in the business and finance professions

Research the employment opportunities for accountants and CPAs in business,
industry, public practice, education, government, and not-for- profit professions.

Students perform independent studies as a means to explore various careers in
accounting/financial pathways and learn about the educational and experience requirements of each

E80E2A023C5847259A5935DE1B3D8815.description: Apply differential analysis to make decisions.

Discuss the importance of integrity, confidentiality, and high ethical standards in
interpretation and use of data.

AFF51E4E599A4FBC90AFBF678C739ED7.description: Discuss auditing procedures for different types of business.

35B3F4320C224673934EA773DBAFEC10.description: Compare and contrast fixed, variable, and mixed costs.

183F658266084A03A3F27AE5C8C5878C.description:

B74FC58B79974C2C8CB3F1C15AAC39F0.description:

87483D57EAF34F59B12AEA19E15DCE16.description: Discuss the cost flow concepts followed by a manufacturing business.

D5C781692C9A45069FDD4F4115C78ACE.description:

E040E64E36FC4B27BD05B85B25AAA6FC.description: Explain the role of managerial accounting in the management process.

776833041E5A46A5B92BBC4AC28130E2.description:

ECA7F4EB85CA478AAC4F7668DCF70DEF.description: Discuss how income tax law is formed.

92B051743D1E46B78B1F09B8312AC6A2.description:

96E0C01EF45F437FAA0A72F6FCD7B1D9.description: Prepare federal, state, and local government payroll reports.

F9D23AD9DA6C45ADA8B5466CAA7FB8DF.description:

systems.

F5D14DA5A7544B22A6D1DEE23829CCAE.description: Analyze stock performance and market fluctuations in a market economy.

and not-for- profit entities.

Investigate and understand the state and national educational and licensing
requirements for careers in the business and finance professions

73E8E7333E7F475CBB3C8B07F48857EE.description:
Students apply appropriate accounting principles to various forms of ownership, payroll,
income taxation, international accounting, and managerial accounting systems.

8EDBC20897CB42168BDDED2016445C65.description:
Discuss and analyze the inherent limitations of the historical cost accounting model
when interpreting financial statements prepared during periods of changing prices.

C5F7D8D2CD9D49D59EEA6287465D76DC.description:
Produce horizontal and vertical analyses and compute appropriate ratios to evaluate

43C5E92806E347A486DFA1725EDA5F45.description: Generate statements of cash flow using the direct and indirect methods.

Discuss the importance of integrity, confidentiality, and high ethical standards in the

E98B22F9F2F34560831F7DC1313689A9.description:

69A634B1A026416EB7CDEEFB18799EC0.description: Differentiate between cost of sales and general operating expenses.

0C2A79A916C04EA08E560860F865BE67.description: Demonstrate both manual and computerized accounting systems for revenues.

286C160A77FA4B7A9A47F5207F15B200.description: Compare and contrast inventory and costing procedures.

93AECCA5253341F9AE698090B58BBA8A.description:
